title.narrative: Making Markets work for the Poor

description.narrative: This activity (Making Markets work for the Poor) is a component of Private Sector Development Programme in Malawi reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £7,293,129. This component benefits Malawi, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural development, Agricultural services. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 14-02-2013 and the end date is 30-11-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - other services

Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2016 Quarter 2
